title: Noam Chomsky - 2007-05-06 - Interview with Students at the University of Sussex - Improved Sound
description:
Be sure to pick at least 720p for best sound quality.
On or about May 6, 2007 Noam Chomsky by video hook-up answered questions from students from the University of Sussex, England.

I combined together 7 videos to make this one.  For the audio, I stripped off the sound and went over it second by second to reduce or eliminate various audio flubs, coughs, etc.  
For the video, I corrected the aspect ratio (which was too narrow). 



Unfortunately, it ends rather suddenly, apparently a minute or more is missing. 

If anyone knows of a fuller copy, please leave a comment about that.

If you'd like an audio-only copy (in flac or MP3), or the video in top quality (.mov - the best, or good quality MP4), visit the Noam Chomsky Audio Conservatory on archive.org 

Thanks to @UltimateHater1 for the uploads.
